data.meanings: to throw away for escaping. wahhasha - to desolate. wuhuush - wild beasts.
data.sentence: The word الْوُحُوشُ comes from the root و ح ش and is associated with the meanings: to throw away for escaping. wahhasha - to desolate. wuhuush - wild beasts.

data.meanings: To gather together, raise from the dead, banish.
data.sentence: The word حُشِرَتْ comes from the root ح ش ر and is associated with the meanings: To gather together, raise from the dead, banish.
